(JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Part 3: Stardust Crusaders)

(JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Part 5: Golden Wind)
8.8/10 		my favourite group dynamic so far and the setting felt new and unique to the part because italy is just cool. the plot was technically better then part 4 with non of those random loose threads but diavolo was such a boring character and got carried so hard by doppio.
(JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Part 4: Diamond is Unbreakable)
9/10 		my favourite jojo's bizarre adventure anime with one of my favourite villains of all time. kira is such an interesting character and this setting was such a breath of fresh air compared to the previous massive world wide trips. kira being so interesting almost makes me forget the random plot points they just forgot to expand on.
(JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Part 2: Battle Tendency)
4.6/10 		a step above part 1 because the main character isnt a piece of cardboard but thats about the only thing i found better in this part and it still has ripple
(JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Part 1: Phantom Blood)
3.9/10 		it was just kind of boring, it had the same jojo vibe but was lacking in every aspect
(Neon Genesis Evangelion)
2.9/10 		the most overhyped series. its boring and repetitive, i hate every character and even if they are realistic it doesnt change the fact that shinji is a little bitch boy, asuka is just a bitch and rei is hardly a person who has almost 0 character development. the plot is so complicated and convoluted with a mystery that is impossible to understand without seeing other evangelion media and forgive me for wanting a series to be able to be digested without going through other movies just to get an understanding of a mystery that should have been answered at the start. no characters ever die, and if they do they are alive in the next episode so i am never worried and the symbolism looks cool but is meaningless and because it looks cool was literally the reason it was added.
